briefTitle: Retrospective Survey of Bone Fracture in Patients With Arimidex 1mg
officialTitle: Retrospective Survey of Bone Fracture in Post-Menopausal Breast Cancer Patients With Arimidex 1 mg as Adjuvant Therapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Post-menopausal breast cancer patients treated with Arimidex 1mg at the time of previously conducted clinical experience investigation.

Exclusion Criteria:

-
